I found this game through a couple of YouTubers/Streamers who I learned the ins and outs from simply by watching them play. I wanted this game for a while so I decided that instead of saving for the full game I would just buy the base. Gotta say, there is a LOT of content in the base game alone. Characters are balanced and the mechanics are fun to experiment with. Lots of customization is available, but it doesn't stop the less... strategic players from having a great time with random builds. Overall great game, too bad it's dying and I'm getting on the hype train 3 years too late.

Assim como outros jogos multiplayer, DbD √© um jogo que chega a ser frustrante algumas vezes. As suas partidas podem ser completamente estragadas por causa de um jogador que n√£o tem esp√≠rito esportivo. Mas sinto que a melhor experi√™ncia que o jogo pode oferecer √© jogar com amigos. Tamb√©m √© um dos melhores (dos poucos) multiplayers assim√©tricos do mercado. Pode ser uma boa porta de entrada caso voc√™ queira experimentar o g√™nero!

Having an absolute blast playing this game. Highly recommend picking this up during a sale when you can. 



Only downsides is the occasional spagett code showing with the many *ahem* "features" this game has to offer when you play killer. Being stuck in place doing nothing when you pick someone up as they DC, or you connect your xbox 1 controller and move your mouse and joystick at the same time causing the game to freak the f*** out allowing you to move but not turn your camera and not allowing you m1 + interact as well

I won't say toxicity doesn't exist anymore in this game it still does but compared to how it was in 2017 (played for 10 hours then quit due to toxicity) yeah it's definitely better now.

The community is horrible at times, however the rush and satisfaction of some killers is god damn amazing, plus its more welcome to new players by immediately giving the strongest killer and some top tier perks. 7/10 Great game, though the community and difference between strongest killers and the weakest killers keeps it from being 9/10. The last bit is just because no game can really reach 10/10.
eu murilo salgado rocha amei esse game

The amount of imbalanced matchmaking makes each round a different form of trauma that i enjoy. One round you'll be having fun with a bunch of Dwights that are meming and the next you'll be put against 4 megs running purple flashlights. Neat
its dogshit nothing but david mains lmfao
great game never a dull moment running away from the killer
Getting chased in this game is intense and fun as a survivor.
the very fun and funny game would recommend especially when the killer singles you out and won't leave you alone

Honestly been addicted to this game since its release (2016). Before I even started playing (2018). But fair warning game is hella broken and a lot of angry players. Devs are a bit questionable about fixings and making it more exciting. But I generally enjoy the game and i met some of my bestest friends on it. So yeah, over all the shit storm, a good experience :)
It would be a great game, but there are so many toxic players. The developers make strange bugs every new version.
being a friend and its really good

Bought the game because it was on sale and also some friends played it. Some of the archive quests are stupidly ridiculous. The killer ones are not so bad because you are supposed to play well to get them. But a lot of the survivor ones require you to play bad. For instance, I am supposed to unhook a survivor that unhooked me previously. I have played 5 matches where the killers are really bad and he can't even get us to a dying state. So in order for me to complete this, I must purposely suck and let the killer down me, let someone unhook me, then that person also has to do bad, and then I can finally unhook them. So stupid.

Pontos positivos: Sua lista de jogos instalados na steam fica linda sem isso aqui.

Pontos negativos: Repetitivo, mal balanceado e o resto tudo.
